column4: I have a hardware issue that I don't think is related to Ubuntu (it happens in Windows also).  My computer monitor light will go into hibernate mode and the keyboard will stop working.  The computer/fans/everything in the case seems to be working.  Any ideas?
sounds like it could be overheating
is there a way to check my cpu temp via terminal?
you can check your cmos setings for shutdown temp, you cam look for lmsensors app, but from cli.. I really dont know
